issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
neil@tootalyptus:/disk1$ /disk1/eucalyptus/build/internal/usr/sbin/euca_conf --list-walruses
No credentials found, attempting local authentication
WALRUS	walrus         	walrus-192.168.0.102	192.168.0.102            	BROKEN	{}

Okay, attempting to deregister,

neil@tootalyptus:/disk1$ /disk1/eucalyptus/build/internal/usr/sbin/euca_conf --deregister-walrus --host 192.168.0.102 --component walrus --partition walrus-192.168.0.102 --debug

RESPONSE true


But, it is still there,

neil@tootalyptus:/disk1$ /disk1/eucalyptus/build/internal/usr/sbin/euca_conf --list-walruses 
No credentials found, attempting local authentication
WALRUS	walrus         	walrus-192.168.0.102	192.168.0.102            	BROKEN	{}


No exceptions because we think everything is happy.
